questions.question: What does the 'defer' attribute in a script tag do?
options: Executes the script immediately after loading
Delays script execution until the HTML document is fully parsed
Blocks HTML parsing until the script is loaded and executed
questions.answer: Delays script execution until the HTML document is fully parsed

questions.question: Which of the following reduces image load time?
options: Embedding large images directly in HTML

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a Content Delivery Network (CDN)?
options: To cache content closer to users
questions.answer: To cache content closer to users

questions.question: Which of these techniques improves HTML performance?
What is lazy loading?
options: Avoiding the use of async scripts

questions.question: Which CSS property is used for a flex container?
What is the default value of the 'flex-direction' property?
Which of these is NOT a valid CSS Grid property?
How do you center a div using flexbox?
What does the 'z-index' property do?
options: Controls the stacking order of elements
Defines the horizontal alignment of elements
questions.answer: Controls the stacking order of elements

questions.question: Which data type is NOT supported in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of 'use strict' in JavaScript?
options: Enforces stricter parsing and error handling
Specifies the return type of a function
questions.answer: Enforces stricter parsing and error handling

questions.question: Which method is used to convert a JSON string to an object?
What is the output of `typeof null`?
Which keyword is used to define a variable that cannot be reassigned?
